name: Lost in the void (Cem Kalyoncu, cengizkandemir, lucatonini)
name_original: Lost in the void (Cem Kalyoncu, cengizkandemir, lucatonini)
description:
Our world is dying... We are losing pieces of it every generation. It is your task to stop the inevitable.

Currently prologue and chapter 1 is complete and in playable state. It takes between 30 minutes to 1 hour to complete the game. We are planning to continue development once the voting period ends. If you want to finish the game, don't skip the dialog. You will miss critical information.

Development: Entire game play is data driven. By changing Tiled map files you will be able to change the game play. All maps inside the maps folder will be loaded automatically. If you need more information about how to add new tiles, 

If you experience audio problems, you could delete Sounds.gor file to disable sounds.
